boardgame.name: Captains of Industry
boardgame.description: As a captain of industry in the suitably titled game Captains of Industry, you will vie for domination in the cutthroat arena of the marketplace. To do this, you will:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Build facilities to control supply,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Develop real estate to manipulate demand, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Invest in technology to increase efficiency, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Complete hidden agendas to secure your legacy, and_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Undercut the competition to dominate the marketplace!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You will depend on your opponents to fuel your expansion as they exploit your production for theirs. Supply and demand are king in this player-driven marketplace!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: The Long View: Princes of Florence
Vox Republica 105: Low Down Dirty Cheaters

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
